APC Hosting started off humbly from a home office in June 2003, and has since grown into a reputable hosting company in Singapore, all thanks to the support of our customers, who range from individuals, to SMEs & MNCs. To date, we have kept to our focus of providing top-notch customer service as well as best-in-class hosting solutions to our customers.

This can be seen from the state-of-the-art Tier III+ Datacenter which hosts our facillities, as well as our unrivalled Tier-1 DDoS Protected network. Coupled with true cloud technology with redundancy at every point of failure, Platform as a Service (PaaS) and SSD technology, we have been constantly evolving to bring the best solutions to meet our customers' changing demand. For customers who require connectivity to public clouds like Amazon AWS or Microsoft Azure, we are also in plan to provide direct private connectivity from our network to these public clouds to offer greater reliability, security and at higher speeds to our customers.

To celebrate our 13th Year Anniversary in conjunction with the Great Singapore Sale 2016, we are proud to offer the following special promotions to all!
